a.title: Board Meeting - Future Dates to be Determined at this Meeting

div.div: Board Meeting - Future Dates to be Determined at this Meeting

p.style: line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: center;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 379px; height: 91px; font-family: Arial;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254); padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: March 13, 2020

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254); padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: River Trails School District Parents/Guardians:

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254); padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt;

span.style: font-size: 16px;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: I am writing to inform you of significant changes District 26 will be making with the goal of minimizing the public health risk to our school community related to the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak, while at the same time fulfilling our academic mission on behalf of our students. The District has a dedicated team that has been working tirelessly to monitor the latest developments related to COVID-19, along with guidance from local, regional and national health authorities, in order to establish contingency plans. At this time, River Trails 26 does not have any confirmed cases of the virus.

span.style: background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: Additionally, I have been in close consultation with the superintendents of Township HS District 214 and its sender school districts.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: These decisions were not made lightly. Our goal is to prioritize the safety and well-being of students and staffas well as others in the broader communityby decreasing the need to gather in large groups and in close proximity for prolonged periods of time.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

span.span: At this time, washing our hands and social distancing are the best methods to fight this virus. We have been diligent with the hand washing. The social distancing takes much more effort and sacrifice. We are not used to such restrictions on our lives. But it is time to do this.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: These changes are as follows:

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;

background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: Our schools will be closed to students beginning Monday, March 16, 2020

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: . On Monday, teachers have a professional learning day to prepare for eLearning.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: We will begin eLearning on Tuesday, March 17, 2020

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: . eLearning will continue through Friday, March 20, 2020. At that time, we will begin our

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: Spring Break.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: More information will be forthcoming through our voice, text, email, social media and web pages. Additional information on eLearning will be sent to parents on

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: Monday, March 16, 2020

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: If your child is in grades 2-4 and they do not have access to an electronic device other than a phone, please call Patty Reyes at 224-612-7301 or

a.style: font-family: Arial; white-space: pre; text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: to arrange for chromebook check out. Chromebook check out will be at your students respective school starting March 16 - 20th from 7:45 - 9:00 am and 2:00 - 3:30 pm.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.strong: All events in District 26 schools are cancelled, including Kid Squad

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.span: Comcast is offering free Internet to low income families.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

text-decoration-line: underline; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: text-decoration-line: underline; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: It is likely your children will have questions about their health and safety. Below are some resources to help you talk with your children about the coronavirus.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;
background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

text-decoration-line: underline; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

span.span: https://childmind.org/article/talking-to-kids-about-the-coronavirus/

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 16px;

text-decoration-line: underline; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

text-decoration-line: underline; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254); padding: 0pt 0pt 30pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: As our team has monitored the COVID-19 developments over the past several days, our staff has been working hard to lay the groundwork for a successful transition to remote eLearning. Still, there will be bumps along the way as we adjust to this alternative way of working and learning together. But no matter the format, we aim to maintain the academic excellence and inspired instruction that our students expect from us.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254); padding: 0pt 0pt 30pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases within the Chicago area has been on the rise, including cases due to community spread, which is the spread of the disease without a known source of direct contact to someone else with the disease. We are currently in a position to take proactive measures to reduce the likelihood of exposure among our district community, which is exactly what we are doing by taking these difficult but necessary steps

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254); padding: 0pt 0pt 30pt;

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: Thank you for your understanding, flexibility and fortitude as we rise to meet this challenge together.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: Stay healthy,

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.span: Nancy Wagner, Superintendent

p.style: line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Padres / tutores del distrito escolar de River Trails:

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Le escribo para informarle sobre los cambios significativos que har el Distrito 26 con el objetivo de minimizar el riesgo de salud pblica para nuestra comunidad escolar relacionado con el brote de coronavirus (COVID-19), al mismo tiempo que cumplimos nuestra misin acadmica en nombre de nuestros alumnos. El Distrito cuenta con un equipo dedicado que ha estado trabajando incansablemente para monitorear los ltimos desarrollos relacionados con COVID-19, junto con la orientacin de las autoridades de salud locales, regionales y nacionales, para establecer planes de contingencia. En este momento, River Trails 26 no tiene ningn caso confirmado del virus. Adems, he estado en estrecha consulta con los superintendentes de Township HS District 214 y los distritos escolares del rea.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Estas decisiones no se tomaron a la ligera. Nuestro objetivo es priorizar la seguridad y el bienestar de los estudiantes y el personal, as como de otros en la comunidad en general, disminuyendo la necesidad de reunirse en grupos grandes y muy cerca por perodos prolongados de tiempo. En este momento, lavarse las manos y el distanciamiento social son los mejores mtodos para combatir este virus. Hemos sido diligentes con el lavado de manos. El distanciamiento social requiere mucho ms esfuerzo y sacrificio. No estamos acostumbrados a tales restricciones en nuestras vidas. Pero es hora de hacer esto.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Estos cambios son los siguientes:

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Nuestras escuelas estarn cerradas para los estudiantes a partir del lunes 16 de marzo de 2020

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: . El lunes, los maestros tienen un da de aprendizaje profesional para prepararse para el aprendizaje electrnico.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Comenzaremos eLearning el martes 17 de marzo de 2020

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: . eLearning continuar hasta el viernes 20 de marzo de 2020. En ese momento, comenzaremos nuestras vacaciones de primavera. Se enviar ms informacin a travs de voz, texto, correo electrnico, redes sociales y pginas web.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Se enviar informacin adicional sobre eLearning a los padres el lunes 16 de marzo de 2020.

p.span: Es probable que sus hijos tengan preguntas sobre su salud y seguridad. A continuacin hay algunos recursos para ayudarlo a hablar con sus hijos sobre el coronavirus.

p.span: A medida que nuestro equipo ha monitoreado los desarrollos de COVID-19 en los ltimos das, nuestro personal ha estado trabajando duro para asentar las bases para una transicin exitosa al aprendizaje electrnico remoto. An as, habr obstculos en el camino a medida que nos ajustemos a esta forma alternativa de trabajar y aprender juntos. Pero no importa el formato, nuestro objetivo es mantener la excelencia acadmica y la enseanza inspirada que nuestros estudiantes esperan de nosotros.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: El nmero de casos confirmados de COVID-19 dentro del rea de Chicago ha ido en aumento, incluidos los casos debido a la propagacin en la comunidad, que es la propagacin de la enfermedad sin una fuente conocida de contacto directo con otra persona con la enfermedad. Actualmente estamos en condiciones de tomar medidas proactivas para reducir la probabilidad de exposicin entre nuestra comunidad en el distrito, que es exactamente lo que estamos haciendo al tomar estos pasos difciles pero necesarios

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Gracias por su comprensin, flexibilidad y fortaleza mientras nos elevamos para enfrentar este desafo juntos.

br.br:
March 12, 2020
Effective Immediately:
District 26 schools are cancelling all school before- and after-school clubs, sporting events, and evening activities, as we work with CDC guidelines to prevent the spread of the virus.
If your child is in the before- and after-school care programs offered by the Kid Squad, this program is not cancelled.
February 28, 2020
Dear River Trails 26 Families and Staff,
I wanted to provide you with an update regarding our efforts to ensure the health and safety of our students, staff, and visitors in regards to the flu season which has hit us in recent weeks as well as the new 2019-nCoV virus known as the Coronavirus.
The CDC currently has issued travel guidance to several countries (China, South Korea, Japan, Iran, Italy, and Hong Kong). So far, our general public that has not traveled to those countries are identified as a low risk, but that can change.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) always recommends the following preventive actions to help prevent the spread of respiratory viruses:
Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
If soap and water are not available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.
Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
Stay home when you are sick.
Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash.
Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.
River Trails School District values the health and safety of all students, staff and families. Because of this, we do the following:
Schools are deep cleaned and disinfected at night, including desktops
Door knobs, drinking fountains and other touch points are constantly cleaned and disinfected during the day
Restrooms are cleaned several times a day
Students learn proper hand washing with soap and water and with sanitizing wipes, and how to best cough/sneeze
Ensure that our school buildings are properly equipped with disinfectants and supplies needed to clean all surfaces.
Send home any student demonstrating symptoms immediately.
Send home any staff demonstrating symptoms immediately.
We will work with families to minimize any missed learning opportunities in situations when students are missing school due to illness.
How can you help?
If you or your child is sick, please help by not spreading the illness to others. This means staying at home and avoiding public areas. Contact your doctor immediately. If you or your child has a fever, please stay home for at least 24 hours after you or your child are fever free without the use of fever-reducing drugs like ibuprofen (Motrin/Advil) or acetaminophen (Tylenol).
To get the latest updates on the coronavirus, please see the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention website:
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/about/index.html
Thank you for helping us all stay healthy.
Nancy Wagner
Superintendent, River Trails School District 26
28 de febrero de 2020
Queridas familias de River Trails 26,
Quera brindarle una actualizacin sobre nuestros esfuerzos para garantizar la salud y la seguridad de nuestros estudiantes, personal y visitantes con respecto a la temporada de gripe que nos ha afectado en las ltimas semanas, as como al nuevo virus 2019-nCoV conocido como el Coronavirus.
Actualmente, los CDC han emitido guas de viaje a varios pases (China, Corea del Sur, Japn, Irn, Italia y Hong Kong). Hasta ahora, nuestro pblico en general que no ha viajado a esos pases est identificado como de bajo riesgo, pero eso puede cambiar.
Los Centros para el Control y la Prevencin de Enfermedades (CDC) siempre recomiendan las siguientes acciones preventivas para ayudar a prevenir la propagacin de virus respiratorios:
Lvese las manos con frecuencia con agua y jabn durante al menos 20 segundos.
Si no hay agua y jabn disponibles, use un desinfectante para manos a base de alcohol.
Evite tocarse los ojos, la nariz y la boca con las manos sin lavar.
Evite el contacto cercano con personas enfermas.
Qudese en casa cuando est enfermo.
Cubra su tos o estornude con un pauelo desechable, luego trelo a la basura.
Limpie y desinfecte objetos y superficies que se tocan con frecuencia.
El Distrito Escolar River Trails valora la salud y seguridad de todos los estudiantes, el personal y las familias. Debido a esto, hacemos lo siguiente:
Las escuelas se limpian y desinfectan profundamente por la noche, incluidos los escritorios
Las perillas de las puertas, los bebederos y otros "puntos de contacto" se limpian y desinfectan constantemente durante el da.
Los baos se limpian varias veces al da.
Los estudiantes aprenden a lavarse bien las manos con agua y jabn y con toallitas desinfectantes, y cmo toser / estornudar mejor
Asegurarnos de que nuestros edificios escolares estn equipados adecuadamente con desinfectantes y suministros necesarios para limpiar todas las superficies.
Enviar a casa a cualquier estudiante que demuestre sntomas de inmediato.
Enviar a casa a cualquier personal que demuestre sntomas de inmediato.
Trabajaremos con las familias para minimizar las oportunidades de aprendizaje perdidas en situaciones en las que los estudiantes faltan a la escuela debido a una enfermedad.
Cmo puedes ayudar?
Si usted o su hijo estn enfermos, por favor ayuden al no transmitir la enfermedad a otros. Esto significa quedarse en casa y evitar las reas pblicas. Pngase en contacto con su mdico de inmediato. Si usted o su hijo tienen fiebre, qudese en casa durante al menos 24 horas despus de que usted o su hijo estn libres de fiebre sin el uso de medicamentos antifebriles como el ibuprofeno (Motrin / Advil) o el acetaminofeno (Tylenol).
Para obtener las ltimas actualizaciones sobre el coronavirus, visite el sitio web de los Centros para el Control y la Prevencin de Enfermedades:
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/about/index.html
Gracias por ayudarnos a todos a mantenernos saludables.
Nancy Wagner
Superintendent, River Trails School District 26
Social Media
Are you on Twitter and Facebook? District 26 is! Following us is a great way to hear about District and School events. You will see reminders about Board of Education meetings and easily learn about key decisions made at the meetings. You will also see photos of the wonderful things that go on daily in your neighborhood schools.

BULLY HOTLINE
Please report all incidents of bullying to staff and/or administration. Parents and students can also call the anonymous bully hotline at any of the schools

Indian Grove: 847-298-1976, option 7
RTMS: 847-298-1750, option 7

div.p: River Trails School District 26 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. Proficiency in the English language is not required for admission or participation in the districts activities and programs. The District Homeless Liaison can be reached at 847-297-4120 and/or 1900 East Kensington, Mt. Prospect, IL. River Trails District 26 does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
